# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are
currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability within Farnsworth, please do NOT create a public GitHub issue.

### How to Report

Please email a description of the vulnerability to **timowhite88@example.com** (replace with your private email) or use GitHub's private vulnerability reporting feature if enabled.

**Please include:**
- A detailed description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Affected versions

### Response Timeline
We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide an estimated timeline for a fix. We ask that you give us reasonable time to patch the issue before disclosing it publicly.
